headline: Ask HN: How do you verify backups?
description: I have a versioned backup system using a combination of Time Machine (locally) and Arq+B2 (remote) over two laptops. I've done spot checks to verify that my backups aren't corrupted but I can't figure out how users are supposed to verify their backups aren't corrupted. How do people do this? I'm asking this question in a personal context but I would be curious to know what an enterprise/business context looks like too.
